code: import React from'react';import"rbx/index.css";import{Button}from"rbx";import{buttonState,getCourseNumber,getCourseTerm,hasConflict}from'./times.js';var Course=function Course(_ref){var course=_ref.course,state=_ref.state;return React.createElement(Button,{color:buttonState(state.selected.includes(course)),onClick:function onClick(){return state.toggle(course);},disabled:hasConflict(course,state.selected)},getCourseTerm(course)," CS ",getCourseNumber(course),": ",course.title);};export default Course;
